name: SendGrid
description: Welcome to SendGrid’s Web API v3! This API is RESTful, fully featured, and easy to integrate with.

api_methods.name: Send
api_methods.description: This endpoint allows you to send email over SendGrid’s v3 Web API,

utterances.utterance: Send an email to john.doe@example.com with the subject 'Meeting Reminder' and the body 'Don't forget our meeting at 3 PM tomorrow.'
Can you email sarah.connor@example.com about the project update? The subject should be 'Project Status' and the body 'Here is the latest update on our project.'
I need to send an email to michael.scott@example.com with the subject 'Quarterly Report' and the body 'Please find attached the quarterly report for your review.'
Email jane.doe@example.com with the subject 'Welcome Aboard' and the body 'We are excited to have you join our team!'
Could you send an email to peter.parker@example.com? The subject should be 'Spider-Man Screening' and the body 'Join us for the exclusive screening of Spider-Man this Friday.'
Please email luke.skywalker@example.com with the subject 'Force Training' and the body 'Your next training session is scheduled for next Monday.'
Send an email to bruce.wayne@example.com with the subject 'Gala Invitation' and the body 'You are cordially invited to the annual Wayne Enterprises Gala.'
I need to email clark.kent@example.com about the article deadline. The subject should be 'Deadline Reminder' and the body 'Please submit your article by the end of the day.'
Can you send an email to tony.stark@example.com with the subject 'New Tech Launch' and the body 'We are ready to unveil the latest Stark Industries technology.'
Email hermione.granger@example.com with the subject 'Library Hours' and the body 'The library will be closed this weekend for maintenance.'

api_methods.name: Create a batch ID
api_methods.description: This endpoint allows you to generate a new batch ID. This batch ID can be associated with scheduled sends via the mail/send endpoint.  If you set the SMTPAPI header batch_id, it allows you to then associate multiple scheduled mail/send requests together with the same ID. Then at anytime up to 10 minutes before the schedule date, you can cancel all of the mail/send requests that have this batch ID by calling the Cancel Scheduled Send endpoint.

utterances.utterance: Generate a new batch ID for my scheduled email campaign.
Can you create a batch ID so I can group my scheduled emails together?
I need a batch ID to associate with my upcoming email sends.
Please generate a batch ID for my email marketing campaign.
Create a batch ID for the emails I’m scheduling to send next week.
I’d like to get a batch ID to link my scheduled email sends.
Can you provide a batch ID for my email campaign that’s scheduled for tomorrow?
Generate a batch ID to group my email sends for the holiday promotion.
I need a batch ID to manage my scheduled email sends more efficiently.
Please create a batch ID for the emails I’m planning to send next month.

api_methods.name: Cancel or pause a scheduled send
api_methods.description: This endpoint allows you to cancel or pause an email that has been scheduled to be sent.  If the maximum number of cancellations/pauses are added, HTTP 400 will be returned.  The Cancel Scheduled Sends feature allows the customer to cancel a scheduled send based on a Batch ID included in the SMTPAPI header. Scheduled sends cancelled less than 10 minutes before the scheduled time are not guaranteed to be cancelled.  For more information on Scheduled Sends, visit https://sendgrid.com/docs/Classroom/Send/When_Emails_Are_Sent/can_i_stop_a_scheduled_send.html

utterances.utterance: Can you cancel the email scheduled to be sent tomorrow?
I need to pause the email that's set to go out next week.
Please stop the scheduled email from being sent.
Is it possible to halt the email that's scheduled for this afternoon?
I want to cancel the email that's supposed to be sent on Friday.
Can you pause the email scheduled for next month?
I need to cancel the email that's set to be sent in an hour.
Please pause the email scheduled for next Monday.
Can you stop the email that's scheduled to be sent later today?
I want to halt the email that's supposed to be sent tomorrow morning.

api_methods.name: Create a new suppression group
api_methods.description: This endpoint allows you to create a new suppression group.  Suppression groups, or unsubscribe groups, are specific types or categories of email that you would like your recipients to be able to unsubscribe from. For example: Daily Newsletters, Invoices, System Alerts.  The name and description of the unsubscribe group will be visible by recipients when they are managing their subscriptions.  Each user can create up to 25 different suppression groups.

utterances.utterance: Can you create a new unsubscribe group for our weekly promotions?
I need to set up a suppression group for our monthly newsletters.
Please create a new group for system alerts so users can unsubscribe if they want.
Could you add a suppression group for our invoice emails?
We need a new unsubscribe group for our daily updates.
Can you make a suppression group for our special offers?
I’d like to create a new group for our event notifications.
Please set up a suppression group for our product announcements.
We need a new unsubscribe group for our seasonal newsletters.
Can you create a suppression group for our customer feedback emails?

api_methods.name: Add suppressions to a suppression group
api_methods.description: This endpoint allows you to add email addresses to an unsubscribe group.  If you attempt to add suppressions to a group that has been deleted or does not exist, the suppressions will be added to the global suppressions list.  Suppressions are recipient email addresses that are added to unsubscribe groups. Once a recipient's address is on the suppressions list for an unsubscribe group, they will not receive any emails that are tagged with that unsubscribe group.

utterances.utterance: Add my email to the unsubscribe group for promotional emails.
Can you include my email in the newsletter unsubscribe group?
Please add my email to the group that stops receiving marketing emails.
I want to unsubscribe from the weekly updates group.
Add my email to the group that prevents receiving event notifications.
Can you suppress my email in the group for product announcements?
Please include my email in the group that stops receiving special offers.
I’d like to add my email to the group that unsubscribes from daily deals.
Can you add my email to the group that blocks receiving survey invitations?
Please suppress my email in the group that stops receiving holiday promotions.

api_methods.name: Search for suppressions within a group
api_methods.description: This endpoint allows you to search a suppression group for multiple suppressions.  When given a list of email addresses and a group ID, this endpoint will return only the email addresses that have been unsubscribed from the given group.  Suppressions are a list of email addresses that will not receive content sent under a given group.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: The ID of the suppression group that you would like to search.

utterances.utterance: Can you check which email addresses are unsubscribed from the newsletter group?
Find out who has opted out of the promotional emails group.
Which users have unsubscribed from the weekly updates group?
List the email addresses that have been suppressed in the monthly digest group.
Show me the emails that are not receiving content from the special offers group.
Can you identify the subscribers who have opted out of the event notifications group?
Which email addresses have been unsubscribed from the product launch group?
Find the suppressed emails in the holiday deals group.
List the users who have unsubscribed from the daily tips group.
Show me the email addresses that are not receiving messages from the customer feedback group.

api_methods.name: Create a parse setting
api_methods.description: This endpoint allows you to create a new inbound parse setting.  The inbound parse webhook allows you to have incoming emails parsed, extracting some or all of the content, and then have that content POSTed by SendGrid to a URL of your choosing.

utterances.utterance: Set up a new inbound parse setting to extract email content and post it to my webhook.
Can you create an inbound parse setting for my email parsing needs?
I need to configure a parse setting to handle incoming emails.
Please create a parse setting that will extract and post email content to my specified URL.
How do I set up a parse setting to process incoming emails?
Create a new parse setting to parse and forward email content to my webhook.
I want to establish a parse setting for extracting email data.
Set up a parse setting to parse incoming emails and send the content to my webhook.
Can you help me create a parse setting for email content extraction?
I need a parse setting to parse and post email content to my webhook.
